Fang and Web Strike.name: Fang and Web Strike
Fang and Web Strike.flavor: With expert precision, you drive your blade through your opponent and loose a bolt at the same time.
Fang and Web Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow and a light blade.
Fang and Web Strike.attack: Dexterity vs. AC (melee or ranged), two attacks
Fang and Web Strike.special: Using this power doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks.

Spider Feint.name: Spider Feint
Spider Feint.flavor: You feint, causing your opponent to flinch as you slip past.
Spider Feint.target: One creature in the burst you can see
Spider Feint.effect: You gain a +5 bonus to AC against the target’s opportunity attacks until the end of your next turn.

Venomous Sting.name: Venomous Sting
Venomous Sting.flavor: Using your dark fey power, you deliver a deep and toxic wound.
Venomous Sting.requirement: must be wielding a crossbow or a light blade.
Venomous Sting.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. Make a secondary attack against the target.
Venomous Sting.secondaryOnHit: The target is weakened and takes ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends both).
